column5: Went out last night and took a buddy of mine who doesn't fish too often and has never caught a muskie before.  After 2 and a half hours of nada we finally hit one.  Couldn't get a good measure on it but it was in the 42-43" range.  Nice and fat too.  Needless to say, he wants to go out again.
Good on ya for putting him on as fish.  Where/how was it caught?
Trolling the Ottawa with a spinner....didn't hit too hard but put up a good fight for my buddy.
your first Muskie is like a tatoo....It's with ya for life !!!
nice picture I like the way he holds her I guess he is hooked now congratz to ya guys
Congrats on the first Musky!And a nice one too! My first was about 12 inches.lol
Is that your boat I saw trollin around??....14' Starcraft tinny ???......congrats to your buddy....
